00041     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042     PagingLandScapeTexture::PagingLandScapeTexture(PagingLandScapeTextureManager *textureMgr, 
00043                                                                                                         const String materialBaseName,
00044                                                                                                     const unsigned int numTexture,
00045                                                                                                         const bool isSplatMode) :
00046         mParent(textureMgr),
00047                 mMaterialBaseName(materialBaseName),
00048             mIsLoaded (false),
00049         mIsModified (false),
00050             mDataX (0),
00051             mDataZ (0),
00052         mPaintRect (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1),
00053         mIsPaintRectModified(false),
00054         mDeformRect (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1),
00055         mIsDeformRectModified(false),
00056         mIsSplatMode(isSplatMode),
00057                 mNumTexture(numTexture),
00058                 mIsShadowed(false),
00059                 mIsShaderShadowed(false),
00060                 mIsBaseMode(false)
00061     {
00062         mMaterial.setNull();
00063     }
00064     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065         PagingLandScapeTexture::~PagingLandScapeTexture()
00066         {
00067                 mNumChannelperTexture.clear();                  
00068                 mImages.clear();
00069                 mTextures.clear();
00070                 mBuffers.clear();
00071                 doTextureNeedUpdate.clear();
00072                 isTextureModified.clear();
00073         }
00074         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00075         void PagingLandScapeTexture::setNumTexture()
00076         {
00077                 if (mNumTexture > 0)
00078                 {
00079                         mNumChannelperTexture.reserve(mNumTexture);     
00080                         doTextureNeedUpdate.reserve(mNumTexture);
00081                         isTextureModified.reserve(mNumTexture); 
00082                         mTextures.reserve(mNumTexture);
00083                         mBuffers.reserve(mNumTexture);
00084 
00085                         mImages.reserve(mNumTexture);
00086 
00087                         mNumChannelperTexture.resize(mNumTexture);      
00088                         doTextureNeedUpdate.resize(mNumTexture);
00089                         isTextureModified.resize(mNumTexture);
00090                         mTextures.resize(mNumTexture);
00091                         mBuffers.resize(mNumTexture);           
00092 
00093                         mImages.resize(mNumTexture);
00094 
00095                         for (size_t i = 0; i < mNumTexture; i++)
00096                         {
00097                                 mImages[i].loadDynamicImage (0, 0, 0, 1, PF_BYTE_RGB, true, 1, 0);
00098                         }
00099 
00100                 }
00101         }
00102     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     const String &PagingLandScapeTexture::getMaterialName()
00104     {
00105         return mMaterial->getName ();
00106     }
00107     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00108     void PagingLandScapeTexture::bindCompressionSettings()
00109         {
00110                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00111                 
00112                 Material::TechniqueIterator tIt = mMaterial->getTechniqueIterator ();
00113                 while (tIt.hasMoreElements ())
00114                 {
00115                         Technique * const t = tIt.getNext ();
00116                         Technique::PassIterator pIt = t->getPassIterator ();
00117                         while (pIt.hasMoreElements ())
00118                         {
00119                                 Pass *p = pIt.getNext ();
00120                                 if (p->hasVertexProgram ())
00121                                 {
00122                                         // vertex compression setting
00123                                         GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params = p->getVertexProgramParameters(); 
00124                                         if (opt->VertexCompression)
00125                                         {
00126                                                 bindCompressionSettings (params);
00127                                                 bindCompressionSettings (p->getShadowReceiverVertexProgramParameters ());
00128                                         }
00129                                         // splat settings.
00130                                         GpuProgramParameters::RealConstantEntry * const e = params->getNamedRealConstantEntry ("splatSettings");
00131                                         if (e)
00132                                         {
00133                                                 e->val[0] = static_cast <float> (opt->matHeight[1]);
00134                                                 e->val[1] = static_cast <float> (opt->matHeight[2]); 
00135                                                 e->val[2] = static_cast <float> (opt->maxValue); 
00136                                                 e->val[3] = static_cast <float> (0.0);
00137                                                 e->isSet = true;
00138                                         }
00139                                 }
00140                         }
00141                 }
00142         }
00143         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00144         void PagingLandScapeTexture::bindCompressionSettings(GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params)
00145         {
00146                 GpuProgramParameters::AutoConstantIterator aci = params->getAutoConstantIterator();
00147         bool found = false;
00148         while (aci.hasMoreElements())
00149         {
00150             const GpuProgramParameters::AutoConstantEntry& ace = aci.getNext();
00151             if (ace.paramType == GpuProgramParameters::ACT_CUSTOM && 
00152                 ace.data == MORPH_CUSTOM_PARAM_ID)
00153             {
00154                 found = true;
00155             }
00156         }
00157         if (!found)
00158         {                        
00159             params->setNamedAutoConstant("compressionSettings", 
00160                 GpuProgramParameters::ACT_CUSTOM, MORPH_CUSTOM_PARAM_ID);                       
00161         }
00162     }
00163         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00164         void PagingLandScapeTexture::loadTexturesToModify()
00165         {
00166                 if (mNumTexture > 0 || (mIsShadowed && !mIsShaderShadowed))
00167                 {
00168                         const String nameSep(".");
00169                         const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00170                         const String filename (opt->LandScape_filename);
00171                         const String commonName (StringConverter::toString(mDataZ) + 
00172                                                 nameSep + StringConverter::toString(mDataX));
00173 
00174                         unsigned int channel = 0;
00175                         TextureManager* texMgr = TextureManager::getSingletonPtr();
00176 
00177                         const unsigned short numLodLevels = 
00178                                 mMaterial->getNumLodLevels(MaterialManager::getSingleton()._getActiveSchemeIndex());
00179                         // some texture are shared between techniques, ensure it's loaded once.
00180                         bool imageLoaded = false;
00181                         bool baseLoaded = false;
00182                         bool coverageLoaded = false;
00183                         bool lightLoaded = false;
00184                         bool horizonLoaded = false;
00185 
00186                         for(unsigned short k = 0; k < numLodLevels; k++)
00187                         {
00188                                 Technique *t = mMaterial->getBestTechnique (k);
00189                                 Technique::PassIterator pIt = t->getPassIterator ();
00190                                 String texType;
00191                                 while (pIt.hasMoreElements ())
00192                                 {
00193                                         channel = 0;
00194                                         Pass *p = pIt.getNext ();
00195                                         Pass::TextureUnitStateIterator tuIt = p->getTextureUnitStateIterator ();
00196                                         while (tuIt.hasMoreElements ())
00197                                         {
00198                                                 TextureUnitState *tu = tuIt.getNext ();
00199 
00200                                                 const String texName (tu->getTextureName());
00201                                                 if (!imageLoaded && opt->ImageNameLoad && 
00202                                                         StringUtil::startsWith (texName, opt->image_filename))
00203                                                 {
00204                                                         // if it's an Image Texture mode
00205                                                         mTextures[channel] = texMgr->getByName (texName);
00206                                                         assert (!mTextures[channel].isNull() && 
00207                                                                 String(texName + " is missing").c_str());
00208                                                         mBuffers[channel] = mTextures[channel]->getBuffer();
00209                                                         loadColorTexture (texName, channel);
00210                                                         channel++;
00211                                                         imageLoaded = true;
00212                                                 }
00213                                                 else if (StringUtil::startsWith (texName, filename, false))
00214                                                 {
00215                                                         // if it's a dynamic texture updated by texture mode
00216                                                         // subtracts filename from texname 
00217                                                         String texNameInfo = texName.substr (filename.size ());
00218                                                         //then split on Dot (in case of filename with dot in it.)
00219                                                         const StringVector texNameInfos = 
00220                                                                 StringUtil::split(texNameInfo, nameSep);
00221                                                         texType = texNameInfos[0];
00222 
00223                                                         if (texType == "Alpha")
00224                                                         {
00225                                                                 mTextures[channel] = texMgr->getByName (texName);
00226                                                                 assert (!mTextures[channel].isNull() && 
00227                                                                         String(texName + " is missing").c_str());
00228                                                                 mBuffers[channel] = mTextures[channel]->getBuffer();
00229                                                                 loadAlphaTexture (texName, channel);
00230                                                                 channel++;
00231                                                         }
00232                                                         else if (texType == "Coverage")
00233                                                         {
00234                                                                 mTextures[channel] = texMgr->getByName (texName);
00235                                                                 assert (!mTextures[channel].isNull() && 
00236                                                                         String(texName + " is missing").c_str());
00237                                                                 mBuffers[channel] = mTextures[channel]->getBuffer();
00238                                                                 loadColorTexture (texName, channel);
00239                                                                 coverageLoaded = true;
00240                                                                 channel++;
00241                                                         }
00242                                                         else if (!lightLoaded && !mIsShaderShadowed 
00243                                                                 && texType ==  "Light" )
00244                                                         {
00245                                                                 mLightTexture = texMgr->getByName (texName);
00246                                                                 assert (!mLightTexture.isNull() && 
00247                                                                         String(texName + " is missing").c_str());
00248                                                                 mLightBuffer = mLightTexture->getBuffer();
00249                                                                 loadTexture (texName, mLightImage);
00250 
00251                                                                 assert (mLightBuffer->getWidth () ==  mLightImage.getWidth () && 
00252                                                                         mLightBuffer->getHeight () == mLightImage.getHeight ());
00253 
00254                                                                 String shadowTexName (filename + nameSep + "HS");
00255                                                                 for (size_t k = 1; k < texNameInfos.size(); k++)
00256                                                                         shadowTexName +=  nameSep + texNameInfos[k];
00257                                                                 if (ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().
00258                                                                         resourceExists (opt->groupName, shadowTexName))
00259                                                                 {
00260                                                                         loadTexture (shadowTexName, mShadow);
00261                                                                         assert (mShadow.getWidth () ==  mLightImage.getWidth () && 
00262                                                                                 mShadow.getHeight () == mLightImage.getHeight ());
00263                                                                         lightUpdate ();     
00264                                                                 }
00265                                                                 else
00266                                                                 {
00267                                                                         mIsShadowed = false;
00268                                                                 }
00269                                                                 lightLoaded = true;
00270                                                         }
00271                                                         else if (!coverageLoaded && !baseLoaded && texType == "Base")
00272                                                         {
00273                                                                 mTextures[channel] = texMgr->getByName (texName);
00274                                                                 assert (!mTextures[channel].isNull() && 
00275                                                                         String(texName + " is missing").c_str());
00276                                                                 mBuffers[channel] = mTextures[channel]->getBuffer();
00277                                                                 loadColorTexture (texName, channel);
00278                                                                 channel++;
00279                                                                 baseLoaded = true;
00280                                                         }
00281                                                 }
00282                                         }
00283                                 }
00284                                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumTexture; i++)
00285                                 {
00286                                         mNumChannelperTexture[i] = mImages[i].getBPP () / 8;
00287                                         doTextureNeedUpdate[i] = false;
00288                                         isTextureModified[i] = false;
00289                                 }
00290                         }
00291                 }
00292         }
00293         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00294         void PagingLandScapeTexture::setOptions(void)
00295         {
00296                 PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt  = mParent->getOptions();
00297                 String matClassName ( 
00298                         (opt->VertexCompression ?
00299                         String(mMaterialBaseName + "Decompress")
00300                         :
00301                         mMaterialBaseName));
00302 
00303                 MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName (matClassName);
00304                 if (opt->VertexCompression && material.isNull())
00305                 {
00306                         matClassName = mMaterialBaseName;
00307                         opt->VertexCompression = false;
00308                         opt->lodMorph = false;
00309                         material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName (matClassName);
00310                 }
00311                 assert (!material.isNull() && 
00312                         String(matClassName + "Must exists in the" + opt->groupName + "group").c_str ());
00313                 
00314                 bool hasVertexProgram = false;
00315                 bool hasFragmentProgram = false;
00316 
00317                 Material::TechniqueIterator tIt = material->getTechniqueIterator ();
00318                 while (tIt.hasMoreElements ())
00319                 {
00320                         Technique * const t = tIt.getNext ();
00321                         Technique::PassIterator pIt = t->getPassIterator ();
00322                         while (pIt.hasMoreElements ())
00323                         {
00324                                 Pass * const p = pIt.getNext ();
00325 
00326                                 // vertex shaders.
00327                                 if ( p->hasVertexProgram ())
00328                                 {
00329                                         if (hasVertexProgram == false)
00330                                         {
00331                                                 hasVertexProgram = p->hasVertexProgram ();
00332                                         }
00333                                         GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params = p->getVertexProgramParameters(); 
00334                                         GpuProgramParameters::RealConstantEntry * const e = params->getNamedRealConstantEntry ("splatSettings");
00335                                         if (e)
00336                                         {
00337                                                 opt->normals = true;
00338                                         }                       
00339                                 }               
00340 
00341                                 // pixel shaders.
00342                                 if (hasFragmentProgram == false)
00343                                 {
00344                                         hasFragmentProgram = p->hasFragmentProgram ();  
00345                                 }
00346                         }
00347                 }
00348                 if (!hasVertexProgram) 
00349                 {
00350                         opt->VertexCompression = false;
00351                         opt->lodMorph = false;
00352                 }
00353         }
00354         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00355     bool PagingLandScapeTexture::isMaterialSupported(bool recursive)
00356     {
00357                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00358 
00359                 if (opt->VertexCompression && recursive)
00360                 {
00361                         const String MatClassName (mMaterialBaseName);
00362                         mMaterialBaseName =  mMaterialBaseName + "Decompress";                  
00363                         const bool isOk = MaterialManager::getSingleton ().resourceExists (mMaterialBaseName) && 
00364                                         isMaterialSupported(false);
00365                         mMaterialBaseName = MatClassName;
00366                         if (isOk)
00367                                 return true;
00368                 }
00369 
00370                 MaterialPtr material = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName (mMaterialBaseName);
00371                 assert (!material.isNull() && 
00372                                         String(mMaterialBaseName + " Must exists in the" + opt->groupName + "group").c_str ());
00373 
00374                 unsigned short numPasses = 0;
00375 
00376                 //these will store the maximum number of texture units, alpha textures, 
00377                 //coverage textures, etc. after iterating through all passes in the material
00378                 size_t numTextureUnits = 0;
00379                 size_t numAlphaTexture = 0;
00380                 size_t numCoverageTexture = 0;
00381                 size_t numSplats = 0;
00382                 unsigned int numDynamicTexture = 0;
00383 
00384                 //per pass count
00385                 size_t passNumTextureUnits = 0;
00386                 size_t passNumAlphaTextures = 0;
00387                 size_t passNumCoverageTextures = 0;
00388                 size_t passNumSplats = 0;
00389                 unsigned int passNumDynamicTextures = 0;
00390 
00391                 bool needVertexProgram = false;
00392                 bool needFragmentProgram = false;
00393                 bool isImageMode = false;
00394                 bool isSplatMode = false;
00395                 bool isBaseMode = false;
00396                 
00397                 Material::TechniqueIterator tIt = material->getTechniqueIterator ();
00398                 while (tIt.hasMoreElements ())
00399                 {
00400                         Technique * const t = tIt.getNext ();
00401                         numPasses = std::max (numPasses, t->getNumPasses());
00402                         Technique::PassIterator pIt = t->getPassIterator ();
00403                         while (pIt.hasMoreElements ())
00404                         {
00405                                 passNumTextureUnits = 0;
00406                                 passNumAlphaTextures = 0;
00407                                 passNumCoverageTextures = 0;
00408                                 passNumSplats = 0;
00409                                 passNumDynamicTextures = 0;
00410 
00411                                 Pass * const p = pIt.getNext ();
00412                                 if (needVertexProgram == false)
00413                                         needVertexProgram = p->hasVertexProgram ();
00414                                 if (needFragmentProgram == false)
00415                                         needFragmentProgram = p->hasFragmentProgram ();                         
00416                                 numTextureUnits = std::max (numTextureUnits, p->getNumTextureUnitStates());
00417                                 Pass::TextureUnitStateIterator tuIt = p->getTextureUnitStateIterator ();
00418                                 while (tuIt.hasMoreElements ())
00419                                 {
00420                                         TextureUnitState * const tu = tuIt.getNext ();
00421                                         const String texType (tu->getTextureName());
00422                                         if (std::string::npos == texType.find("."))
00423                                         {
00424                                                 // This Texture Name is A keyword,
00425                                                 // check how many are dynamic in this material
00426                                                 if (!isBaseMode && texType == "Base")
00427                                                 {
00428                                                         isBaseMode = true;
00429                                                         passNumDynamicTextures++;
00430                                                 }
00431                                                 else if (!isImageMode && texType == "Image")
00432                                                 {
00433                                                         isImageMode = true;
00434                                                         passNumDynamicTextures++;
00435                                                 }
00436                                                 else if (texType == "Alpha")
00437                                                 {
00438                                                         isSplatMode = true;
00439                                                         passNumAlphaTextures++;
00440                                                         passNumDynamicTextures++;
00441                                                 }
00442                                                 else if (texType == "Coverage")
00443                                                 {
00444                                                         isSplatMode = true;
00445                                                         passNumDynamicTextures++;
00446                                                         passNumCoverageTextures++;
00447                                                 }
00448                                                 else if (texType == "Splatting")
00449                                                 {
00450                                                         mIsSplatMode = true;
00451                                                         passNumSplats++;
00452                                                 }
00453                                                 else if (texType == "Light")
00454                                                 {
00455                                                         //dynamic light... but in software
00456                                                         mIsShadowed = true;
00457                                                 }
00458                                                 else if (texType == "Horizon")
00459                                                 {
00460                                                         //dynamic light...  but shader
00461                                                         mIsShaderShadowed = true;
00462                                                         mIsShadowed = true;
00463                                                 }
00464                                         }
00465                                 }
00466                                 
00467                                 if(passNumTextureUnits > numTextureUnits)
00468                                         numTextureUnits = passNumTextureUnits;
00469 
00470                                 if(passNumAlphaTextures > numAlphaTexture)
00471                                         numAlphaTexture = passNumAlphaTextures;
00472 
00473                                 if(passNumCoverageTextures > numCoverageTexture)
00474                                         numCoverageTexture = passNumCoverageTextures;
00475 
00476                                 if(passNumSplats > numSplats)
00477                                         numSplats = passNumSplats;
00478 
00479                                 if(passNumDynamicTextures > numDynamicTexture)
00480                                         numDynamicTexture = passNumDynamicTextures;
00481 
00482                         }
00483                 }
00484                 if (isImageMode && !opt->ImageNameLoad)
00485                         return false;
00486                 if (opt->numTextureUnits < numTextureUnits)
00487                         return false;        
00488                 if (needVertexProgram && opt->hasVertexShader == false)
00489                         return false;
00490                 if (needFragmentProgram && opt->hasFragmentShader == false)
00491                         return false;
00492 
00493                 if (isSplatMode && numAlphaTexture && opt->NumMatHeightSplat < numAlphaTexture)
00494                         return false;
00495 
00496                 // does all coverage must be 4 alpha ?
00497                 //if (isSplatMode && numCoverageTexture && opt->NumMatHeightSplat < numCoverageTexture * 4)
00498                 //      return false;
00499                 if (isSplatMode && numCoverageTexture && opt->NumMatHeightSplat < 4)
00500                         return false;
00501 
00502                 if (mIsShaderShadowed && !opt->hasFragmentShader2)
00503                         return false;
00504 
00505                 mIsSplatMode = isSplatMode;
00506                 mIsBaseMode = !mIsSplatMode && isBaseMode;
00507                 mNumTexture = (mParent->getOptions()->textureModifiable)? numDynamicTexture : 0;
00508                 return true;
00509         }
00510         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00511         void PagingLandScapeTexture::_loadMaterial()
00512         {
00513                 if (mMaterial.isNull())
00514                 {
00515                         const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00516                         const String nameSep(".");
00517                         const String commonName (StringConverter::toString(mDataZ) + 
00518                                 nameSep + StringConverter::toString(mDataX));
00519                         if (opt->materialPerPage)
00520                         {
00521                                 // JEFF - all material settings configured through material script
00522                                 mMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(
00523                                         mMaterialBaseName + commonName);
00524                         }
00525                         else
00526                         {
00527                                 const String filename (opt->LandScape_filename);
00528                                 const bool compressed = opt->VertexCompression;
00529                                 const String MatClassName ( 
00530                                         (compressed ?
00531                                                                 String(mMaterialBaseName + "Decompress")
00532                                                                 :
00533                                                                 mMaterialBaseName));
00534                                 const String matname (MatClassName + nameSep 
00535                                                                                 + commonName + nameSep  
00536                                                                                 + filename);
00537                                 mMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(matname);
00538                                 if (mMaterial.isNull())
00539                                 {                                       
00540                                         mMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(MatClassName);
00541                                         assert (!mMaterial.isNull() && 
00542                                                         String(MatClassName + "Must exists in the" + opt->groupName + "group").c_str ());
00543                                         mMaterial = mMaterial->clone(matname);
00544                                         const String extName (opt->TextureExtension);
00545                                         const String beginName (filename + nameSep);
00546                                         const String endName (nameSep + commonName + 
00547                                                                                   nameSep);
00548                                         bool deformable;
00549                                         String texName, finalTexName;
00550                                         unsigned int channel = 0;
00551                                         unsigned int splat = 0;
00552 
00553                                         unsigned int alphachannel = 0;
00554                                         unsigned int coveragechannel = 0;
00555 
00556                                         Material::TechniqueIterator tIt = mMaterial->getTechniqueIterator ();
00557                                         while (tIt.hasMoreElements ())
00558                                         {
00559                                                 Technique * const t = tIt.getNext ();
00560                                                 Technique::PassIterator pIt = t->getPassIterator ();
00561                                                 while (pIt.hasMoreElements ())
00562                                                 {
00563                                                         splat = 0;
00564                                                         channel = 0;
00565                                                         coveragechannel = 0;
00566                                                         alphachannel = 0;
00567                                                         Pass * const p = pIt.getNext ();
00568                                                         Pass::TextureUnitStateIterator tuIt = p->getTextureUnitStateIterator ();
00569                                                         while (tuIt.hasMoreElements ())
00570                                                         {
00571                                                                 TextureUnitState * const tu = tuIt.getNext ();
00572                                                                 const String texType (tu->getTextureName());
00573                                                                 if (std::string::npos == texType.find("."))
00574                                                                 {
00575                                                                         // This Texture Name is A keyword,
00576                                                                         // meaning we have to dynamically replace it
00577                                                                         deformable = false;
00578                                                                         // check by what texture to replace keyword
00579                                                                         if (texType == "Image")
00580                                                                         {
00581                                                                                 texName = opt->image_filename + endName;
00582                                                                                 deformable = true;
00583                                                                         }
00584                                                                         else if (texType == "Splatting")
00585                                                                         {
00586                                                                                 texName = opt->SplatDetailMapNames[splat];
00587                                                                                 splat++;
00588                                                                         }
00589                                                                         else if (texType == "Base")
00590                                                                         {
00591                                                                                 texName = beginName + texType + endName;
00592                                                                                 channel++;
00593                                                                                 deformable = true;
00594                                                                         }
00595                                                                         else if (texType == "Alpha")
00596                                                                         {
00597                                                                                 texName = beginName + texType + nameSep + 
00598                                                                                         StringConverter::toString(alphachannel) + endName;
00599                                                                                 deformable = true;
00600                                                                                 alphachannel++;
00601                                                                                 channel++;
00602                                                                         }
00603                                                                         else if (texType == "Coverage")
00604                                                                         {
00605                                                                                 texName = beginName + texType + nameSep + 
00606                                                                                         StringConverter::toString(coveragechannel) + endName;
00607                                                                                 deformable = true;
00608                                                                                 channel++;
00609                                                                                 coveragechannel++;
00610                                                                         }
00611                                                                         else if (texType ==  "Light")
00612                                                                         {
00613                                                                                 texName = beginName +  texType + endName + extName;                                                                             
00614                                                                         }
00615                                                                         else if (texType ==  "Horizon")
00616                                                                         {
00617                                                                                 texName = beginName +  "HSP" + endName + extName;
00618                                                                                 mPositiveShadow = true;                   
00619                                                                         }
00620                                                                         if (deformable)
00621                                                                         {
00622                                                                                 if(opt->Deformable &&
00623                                                                                         ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(
00624                                                                                                         opt->groupName, 
00625                                                                                                         texName + "modif." + extName))
00626                                                                                 {
00627                                                                                         finalTexName = texName + "modif." + extName;             
00628                                                                                 }
00629                                                                                 else
00630                                                                                 {
00631                                                                                         finalTexName = texName + extName;
00632                                                                                 }
00633                                                                         }
00634                                                                         else
00635                                                                         {
00636                                                                                 finalTexName = texName;
00637                                                                         }
00638                                                                         tu->setTextureName (finalTexName);
00639                                                                 }
00640                                                         }
00641                                                 }
00642                                         }
00643                                 }
00644                         }
00645                 }
00646         }
00647         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00648         void PagingLandScapeTexture::_unloadMaterial()
00649         {
00650 
00651 
00652         }
00653     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00654     void PagingLandScapeTexture::load(unsigned int x, unsigned int z)
00655     {
00656         if (!mIsLoaded && isMaterialSupported())
00657                 {
00658                 mDataX = x;
00659                         mDataZ = z;
00660                         updated();
00661                         setNumTexture ();
00662                 _loadMaterial();
00663                         const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00664                         mMaterial->setLightingEnabled (opt->lit);
00665                         mMaterial->setLodLevels (opt->lodMaterialDistanceList);
00666                         mMaterial->setReceiveShadows (true);
00667                         // If vertex shader, have to bind parameters
00668                         bindCompressionSettings ();
00669                         mMaterial->load ();
00670                         // load texture in main memory if we want to update it Real-Time
00671                         loadTexturesToModify();
00672 
00673                 mIsLoaded = true;
00674             mIsModified = false; 
00675         }
00676     }
00677     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00678         void PagingLandScapeTexture::unload()
00679         {
00680         if (mIsLoaded)
00681         {
00682             if (mIsModified && mParent->getOptions()->saveDeformation)
00683                 _save();
00684 
00685                         if (!mMaterial.isNull())
00686                                 mMaterial->unload();
00687 
00688                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumTexture; i++)
00689                         {
00690                                 doTextureNeedUpdate[i] = false;
00691                                 isTextureModified[i] = false;
00692                                 mBuffers[i].setNull ();
00693                                 mTextures[i].setNull ();
00694                                 mImages[i].loadDynamicImage (0, 0, 0, 1, PF_BYTE_RGB, true, 1, 0);
00695                         } 
00696                         // Anyway, they're surely null already, as they're freed by delete page()
00697                         
00698                 _unloadMaterial();
00699 
00700                         const String resourceName (mMaterial->getName ());
00701 
00702             assert (!mMaterial.isNull() && "PagingLandScapeTexture::unload");      
00703                         mMaterial->unload();
00704                         mMaterial.setNull();
00705                         MaterialManager::getSingleton().remove (resourceName);
00706 
00707                 mIsLoaded = false;
00708         }
00709 
00710         }
00711         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00712         void PagingLandScapeTexture::_save(void)
00713         {
00714                 assert (!mMaterial.isNull() && "PagingLandScapeTexture::::_save");  
00715                 
00716                 const PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00717                 if (mNumTexture > 0 && opt->textureModifiable)
00718                 {
00719                         const String extname (opt->TextureExtension);
00720                         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumTexture; i++)
00721                         {
00722                                 if (isTextureModified[i])
00723                                 {
00724                                         String texName = mTextures[i]->getName ();
00725 
00726                                         FileInfoListPtr finfo =  ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().findResourceFileInfo (
00727                                                                                                         opt->groupName, texName);
00728                                         FileInfoList::iterator it = finfo->begin();
00729                                         if (it != finfo->end())
00730                                         {
00731                                                 char *olddir = ChangeToDir (const_cast< char * > (((it)->archive->getName()).c_str()));
00732                                                         //FileSystemArchive::pushDirectory()
00733 
00734                                                 assert (mImages[i].getData ());
00735                                                 // check if we have to add modif to the name.
00736                                                 const String baseTexName (texName, 0, texName.size () - extname.size());
00737                                                 if (!StringUtil::endsWith (baseTexName, "modif."))
00738                                                 {
00739                                                         texName = baseTexName + "modif." + extname; 
00740                                                 }
00741                                                 mImages[i].save (texName); 
00742 
00743                                                 RetablishDir (olddir);
00744                                                         //FileSystemArchive::popDirectory();
00745 
00746                                         } // if (it != finfo->end())
00747                                 } // if (doTextureNeedUpdate[i])
00748                         } // for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumTexture; i++)       
00749                 }
00750         }
00751         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00752         void PagingLandScapeTexture::upload(const Image::Box& textureRect)
00753         {    
00754                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
00755                 assert (!mMaterial.isNull() && "PagingLandScapeTexture::update()");
00756 
00757                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < mNumTexture; i++)
00758                 {
00759                         if (doTextureNeedUpdate[i])
00760                         {
00761                                 assert (!mTextures[i].isNull() && "PagingLandScapeTexture::update()");
00762                                 assert (!mBuffers[i].isNull() && "PagingLandScapeTexture::update()");
00763                                 assert (mImages[i].getData () != 0 && "PagingLandScapeTexture::update()");
00764 
00765                                 const PixelBox srcBox = mImages[i].getPixelBox().getSubVolume(textureRect);     
00766                                 const PixelBox lock = mBuffers[i]->lock(textureRect, HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD); 
00767                                 PixelUtil::bulkPixelConversion(srcBox, lock); 
00768                                 mBuffers[i]->unlock();          
00769 
00770                                 doTextureNeedUpdate[i] = false;
00771                                 isTextureModified[i] = true;
00772 
00773                                 //#define _Missed_Spot 
00774 
00775                                 #ifdef _Missed_Spot                
00776                                         // debug can help finding missed spot.
00777                                         const PixelBox srcSpotBox = mImages[i].getPixelBox();   
00778                                         const unsigned int textureSize = (mParent->getOptions()->PageSize - 1) *
00779                                                 mParent->getOptions()->TextureStretchFactor;
00780                                         const Image::Box rect (0, 0, 0, textureSize, textureSize, 1);
00781                                         const PixelBox lockSpot = mBuffers[i]->lock (rect ,HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD); 
00782                                         PixelUtil::bulkPixelConversion(srcSpotBox, lockSpot); 
00783                                         mBuffers[i]->unlock();
00784                                 #endif //_Missed_Spot   
00785                         }
00786                 }        
00787         }
00788     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00789     bool PagingLandScapeTexture::isLoaded() const
00790     {
00791             return mIsLoaded;
00792     }
00793     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00794     const MaterialPtr&  PagingLandScapeTexture::getMaterial() const
00795     {
00796             return mMaterial;
00797         }
00798         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00799         void PagingLandScapeTexture::loadAlphaTexture(const String &filename, const unsigned int channel)
00800         {       
00801                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
00802                 if (mImages[channel].getData () == 0)
00803                 {                       
00804                         Image Imageloader;
00805                         Imageloader.load(filename, mParent->getOptions()->groupName);
00806                         const size_t size = Imageloader.getSize();
00807                         uchar *data = new uchar [size];
00808                         memcpy (data, Imageloader.getData(), size*sizeof(uchar));
00809                         mImages[channel].loadDynamicImage(data, 
00810                                 Imageloader.getWidth(), Imageloader.getHeight(), 
00811                                 1,  PF_A8, true, 1, 0); 
00812                 }
00813                 
00814                 assert (mImages[channel].getHeight() == mImages[channel].getWidth());
00815                 assert (mImages[channel].getHeight() / (mParent->getOptions()->PageSize - 1)
00816                         == mParent->getOptions()->TextureStretchFactor && 
00817                         String("(texture size / (pagesize-1)) and texture stretch factor defined in terrain config file doesn't fit.").c_str());
00818         }
00819         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00820         void PagingLandScapeTexture::loadColorTexture(const String &filename, const unsigned int channel)
00821         {  
00822                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);               
00823 
00824                 loadTexture (filename, mImages[channel]);
00825 
00826                 assert (mImages[channel].getHeight() == mImages[channel].getWidth());
00827                 assert (mImages[channel].getHeight() / (mParent->getOptions()->PageSize - 1)
00828                         == mParent->getOptions()->TextureStretchFactor && 
00829                         String("(texture size / (pagesize-1)) and texture stretch factor defined in terrain config file doesn't fit.").c_str());
00830         }
00831         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00832         void PagingLandScapeTexture::loadTexture(const String &filename, Image &img)
00833         {  
00834                 if (img.getData () == 0)
00835                 {
00836                         img.load(filename, mParent->getOptions()->groupName);   
00837                 }
00838         }
00839     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00840     void PagingLandScapeTexture::updated ()
00841     {
00842         mPaintRect.left = 0;
00843         mPaintRect.right = 0;
00844         mPaintRect.top = 0;
00845         mPaintRect.bottom = 0;
00846         mIsPaintRectModified = false;
00847  
00848         mDeformRect.left = 0;
00849         mDeformRect.right = 0;
00850         mDeformRect.top = 0;
00851         mDeformRect.bottom = 0;
00852         mIsDeformRectModified = false;
00853     }
00854     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00855     void PagingLandScapeTexture::compute(
00856                 PagingLandScapeData2D* data, 
00857         const Image::Box& dataRect,
00858         const Image::Box& textureRect)
00859     {
00860                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
00861         const size_t heightfiledsize = mParent->getOptions()->PageSize - 1;
00862         const Real textureScale = mParent->getOptions()->TextureStretchFactor;
00863         const unsigned int textureSize = heightfiledsize * textureScale;
00864         unsigned int curr_image_pos = static_cast <unsigned int>(textureRect.top*textureSize + textureRect.left);
00865         const unsigned int image_width = static_cast <unsigned int>((textureSize - (textureRect.right - textureRect.left)));
00866         const Real inv_scale = 1 / textureScale;
00867 
00868         const Real * const ogre_restrict heightData = data->getHeightData ();
00869         assert (heightData && "PagingLandScapeTexture::compute()");
00870 
00871         for (size_t k = textureRect.top; k < textureRect.bottom; ++k)
00872         {
00873             const unsigned int k_terrain = (unsigned int)(k * inv_scale);
00874             const size_t curr_row = k_terrain * heightfiledsize;
00875             for (size_t i = textureRect.left; i < textureRect.right; ++i)
00876             {             
00877                 const unsigned int i_terrain = (unsigned int)(i * inv_scale);
00878 
00879                 assert (i < textureSize && k < textureSize && 
00880                     "PagingLandScapeTexture::compute()");
00881 
00882                 assert (i_terrain < heightfiledsize && k_terrain < heightfiledsize && 
00883                     "PagingLandScapeTexture::compute()");
00884 
00885                                 if (mIsSplatMode)
00886                                         computePointAlpha(curr_image_pos,
00887                             heightData[i_terrain + curr_row], 
00888                             1.0f - data->getNormal (i_terrain, k_terrain).y);
00889                                 if (mIsBaseMode)
00890                                         computePointColor (curr_image_pos,
00891                                                         heightData[i_terrain + curr_row], 
00892                                                         1.0f - data->getNormal (i_terrain, k_terrain).y);
00893 
00894                 curr_image_pos += 1;
00895             }
00896             curr_image_pos += image_width;
00897         }  
00898     }
00899     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00900     void PagingLandScapeTexture::paint (const unsigned int xParam, 
00901                                                                                 const unsigned int zParam, 
00902                                                                                 const Real paintForce)
00903         {
00904                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
00905                 assert (paintForce >= 0.0f && paintForce <= 1.0f && "PagingLandScapeTexture::paint()");
00906                 const Real blend = paintForce;
00907  
00908         const size_t psize = mParent->getOptions()->PageSize - 1;       
00909         const Real textureScale = mParent->getOptions ()->TextureStretchFactor;        
00910         const unsigned int textureScaleCount = static_cast <unsigned int> (textureScale);
00911 
00912         assert (((xParam + zParam *  psize) < psize*psize) && "PagingLandScapeTexture::paint()");
00913 
00914         const unsigned int xScaled = xParam * textureScaleCount;
00915         const unsigned int zScaled = zParam * textureScaleCount;
00916         const size_t pSizeScaled = psize * textureScaleCount;
00917 
00918         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < textureScaleCount; j++)
00919         {
00920                         const unsigned int z = zScaled + j;
00921                         if (z < pSizeScaled)
00922                         {
00923                                 const unsigned int zShift = z * pSizeScaled;
00924                                 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < textureScaleCount; k++)
00925                                 {
00926                                         const unsigned int x = xScaled + k;
00927                                         if (x < pSizeScaled)
00928                                         {
00929                                                 const unsigned int curr_image_pos = x + zShift;
00930                                                 assert (curr_image_pos < pSizeScaled*pSizeScaled);
00931                                                 paintPoint (curr_image_pos, blend);
00932                                                 adjustPaintRectangle (x, z); 
00933                                         }
00934                                 }
00935                         }
00936         }
00937     }
00938     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00939     void PagingLandScapeTexture::update()
00940     {       
00941                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
00942         // at least deformed once, so need to save texture if asked by user (option)
00943         mIsModified = true; 
00944 
00945         Image::Box dataRect (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
00946         Image::Box texturerect (0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1);
00947 
00948         // computes deformation
00949         PagingLandScapeData2D *data = 0;
00950         if (mIsDeformRectModified)
00951         {
00952                         dataRect = mDeformRect;
00953                         data = mParent->getSceneManager()->getData2DManager()->getData2D(mDataX, mDataZ);
00954 
00955             if (dataRect.getWidth() && dataRect.getHeight ())
00956             {
00957 
00958                 const Real textureScale = mParent->getOptions()->TextureStretchFactor;
00959 
00960                 texturerect.left = dataRect.left * textureScale;
00961                 texturerect.top  = dataRect.top * textureScale;
00962                 texturerect.right = dataRect.right * textureScale + 1;
00963                 texturerect.bottom = dataRect.bottom * textureScale + 1;
00964 
00965                 dataRect.right += 1;
00966                 dataRect.bottom += 1;
00967                 compute(data, dataRect, texturerect);
00968             }
00969         }
00970         // try to upload only the smallest rectangle containing modification
00971         if (mIsPaintRectModified)
00972         {
00973             if (mIsDeformRectModified)
00974             {
00975                 texturerect.left = std::min (mPaintRect.left, dataRect.left);
00976                 texturerect.right = std::max (mPaintRect.right, dataRect.right);
00977                 texturerect.top =  std::min (mPaintRect.top, dataRect.top);
00978                 texturerect.bottom = std::max (mPaintRect.bottom, dataRect.bottom);
00979             } 
00980             else
00981             {
00982                 texturerect = mPaintRect;
00983 
00984                 texturerect.right += 1;
00985                 texturerect.bottom += 1;
00986             }
00987         } // if (mIsRectModified)
00988 
00989 
00990         // Upload any changes (deformation or)
00991         if (texturerect.getWidth() && texturerect.getHeight ())
00992         {
00993             upload (texturerect);           
00994         } // if (texturerect.getWidth() && texturerect.getHeight ())
00995 
00996         if (mIsDeformRectModified)
00997             data->resetDeformationRectangle ();
00998         PagingLandScapeTexture::updated ();
00999     }
01000     
01001     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01002     bool PagingLandScapeTexture::needUpdate () const
01003     {
01004         return mIsDeformRectModified || mIsPaintRectModified;
01005     } 
01006     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01007         void PagingLandScapeTexture::adjustDeformationRectangle(unsigned int x, unsigned int z)
01008     {
01009                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
01010         assert (x < (mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize));
01011         assert (z < (mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize));
01012 
01013         if (mIsDeformRectModified)
01014         {
01015             if (mDeformRect.left > x)
01016                 mDeformRect.left = x;
01017             if (mDeformRect.right < x)
01018                 mDeformRect.right = x;
01019 
01020             if (mDeformRect.top > z)
01021                 mDeformRect.top = z;
01022             if (mDeformRect.bottom < z)
01023                 mDeformRect.bottom = z;
01024         }
01025         else
01026         {
01027             // first modification :
01028             // deformation rectangle is the point
01029             mDeformRect.left    = x;
01030             mDeformRect.right   = x;
01031             mDeformRect.top     = z;
01032             mDeformRect.bottom  = z;
01033             mIsDeformRectModified = true;
01034         }
01035     } 
01036     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01037         void PagingLandScapeTexture::adjustPaintRectangle(unsigned int x, unsigned int z)
01038     {
01039                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
01040         assert (x < ((mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize - 1) * mParent->getOptions ()->TextureStretchFactor));
01041         assert (z < ((mParent->getOptions ()->PageSize - 1) * mParent->getOptions ()->TextureStretchFactor));
01042         
01043         if (mIsPaintRectModified)
01044         {
01045             if (mPaintRect.left > x)
01046                 mPaintRect.left = x;
01047             else if (mPaintRect.right < x)
01048                 mPaintRect.right = x;
01049 
01050             if (mPaintRect.top > z)
01051                 mPaintRect.top = z;
01052             else if (mPaintRect.bottom < z)
01053                 mPaintRect.bottom = z;
01054         }
01055         else
01056         {
01057             // first modification :
01058             // deformation rectangle is the point
01059             mPaintRect.left = x;
01060             mPaintRect.right = x;
01061             mPaintRect.top = z;
01062             mPaintRect.bottom = z;
01063             mIsPaintRectModified = true;
01064         }
01065         }
01066         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01067         void PagingLandScapeTexture::lightUpdate()
01068         {               
01069                 PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
01070                 if (mIsShaderShadowed)
01071                 {
01072                         const Real SunAngle = opt->SunAngle;
01073                         const Vector3 SunDir = opt->Sun;
01074 
01075                         const bool positiveHorizon =  (SunDir.y > 0);// Sun is west (true), east (false);
01076                         assert (fabs (SunAngle) < 1.1f);
01077 
01078                         const Real LightAngle =  (positiveHorizon)? SunAngle  : -SunAngle;
01079                         if (positiveHorizon != mPositiveShadow)
01080                         {
01081                                 const String texname  (opt->LandScape_filename
01082                                         +
01083                                         ((positiveHorizon)? String(".HSP.") : String(".HSN."))
01084                                         +
01085                                         StringConverter::toString(mDataZ) + 
01086                                         String(".") +
01087                                         StringConverter::toString(mDataX) +  "." + 
01088                                         opt->TextureExtension); 
01089                                 mMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(2)->setTextureName (texname);                
01090                                 mPositiveShadow = positiveHorizon;
01091                         }
01092                         GpuProgramParametersSharedPtr params = mMaterial->getBestTechnique()->getPass(0)->getFragmentProgramParameters();   
01093                         GpuProgramParameters::RealConstantEntry * const e = params->getNamedRealConstantEntry ("HorizonSettings");
01094                         assert (e);
01095                         e->val[0] = static_cast <float> (SunDir.x);
01096                         e->val[1] = static_cast <float> (SunDir.y); 
01097                         e->val[2] = static_cast <float> (SunDir.z); 
01098                         e->val[3] = static_cast <float> (LightAngle);
01099                         e->isSet = true;        
01100                 }
01101                 else if (mIsShadowed)
01102                 {
01103                         assert (mLightImage.getData ());
01104                         computeLightMap ();
01105 
01106                         // Upload changes         
01107                         const PixelBox srcBox = mLightImage.getPixelBox();      
01108                         const unsigned int mTextureSize = mParent->mPageSize * opt->TextureStretchFactor;
01109                         const Image::Box rect (0, 0, 0, mTextureSize, mTextureSize, 1);
01110                         const PixelBox lock = mLightBuffer->lock (rect , HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD); 
01111                         PixelUtil::bulkPixelConversion(srcBox, lock); 
01112                         mLightBuffer->unlock();
01113                 }
01114         }
01115         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01116         void PagingLandScapeTexture::computeLightMap () const
01117         {    
01118                 assert(mIsShadowed);
01119                 PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
01120                 const Vector3 LightDir = opt->Sun;
01121                 const Real SunAngle = opt->SunAngle;
01122 
01123                 const bool positiveHorizon =  (LightDir.y > 0);// Sun is west (true), east (false);
01124                 assert (fabs (SunAngle) < 1.1f);
01125 
01126                 const Real LightAngle =  (positiveHorizon)? SunAngle  : -SunAngle;       
01127                 const size_t offsetneg = (positiveHorizon)? 0: 1;
01128                 //const Real LightAngle = SunAngle;
01129 
01130 
01131                 unsigned int curr_rowY = 0;
01132                 const uchar BScale = 255;
01133                 const Real uchardivider = 1.0f / BScale;
01134                 unsigned int curr_image_pos = 0;
01135                 uchar * const ogre_restrict lightmap = (uchar *) (mLightImage.getData ());
01136                 const uchar * const ogre_restrict HorizonAngle = mShadow.getData(); 
01137 
01138                 const unsigned int mTextureSize = (unsigned int) mLightImage.getWidth ();
01139                 assert ((mShadow.getBPP ()) / 8 == 3);
01140                 const unsigned int rowpitch = mTextureSize*3;
01141                 for(unsigned int nZ = 0; nZ < mTextureSize ; nZ++) 
01142                 {
01143                         unsigned int curr_image_posX = 0;
01144                         for(unsigned int nX = 0; nX < mTextureSize; nX++)
01145                         {            
01146                                 const unsigned int nVert = static_cast <unsigned int> (curr_rowY + curr_image_posX  + offsetneg);
01147                                 const Real hAngle = HorizonAngle[nVert] * uchardivider;
01148                                 if (hAngle < LightAngle) 
01149                                 {           
01150                                         const Real intensity =  1 - (LightAngle - hAngle);
01151                                         if (intensity > 0.0f) 
01152                                         {                       
01153                                                 //intensity *= std::max(LightDir.dotProduct (data->getNormal (nX, nZ)), 0.0f);
01154                                                 lightmap[curr_image_pos] = static_cast <uchar> (intensity * BScale);
01155 
01156                                         }
01157                                         else
01158                                         {
01159                                                 // totally in shadow    
01160                                                 lightmap[curr_image_pos] = 0;    
01161                                         }
01162                                 }
01163                                 else             
01164                                 {
01165                                         // if Vertex is lighted
01166                                         const Real intensity = BScale;           
01167                                         //const Real intensity = BScale * std::min(1.0f, LightDir.dotProduct (data->getNormal (nX, nZ))); 
01168                                         lightmap[curr_image_pos] = static_cast <uchar> (intensity);
01169                                 }               
01170                                 // if colored light should use a rgb map..
01171 
01172                                 curr_image_pos ++;
01173                                 curr_image_posX += 3;
01174                         }
01175                         curr_rowY += rowpitch;
01176                 }    
01177 
01178         }
01179         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01180         void PagingLandScapeTexture::computePointAlpha(
01181                 const unsigned int imagePos,
01182                 const Real height, 
01183                 const Real slope)
01184         {
01185                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
01186                 const unsigned int numHeights = mParent->getOptions()->NumMatHeightSplat;
01187                 unsigned int indx = 1;
01188                 while (indx < (numHeights - 1) && height >= mParent->heights[indx])
01189                         indx++;                                
01190 
01191                 const unsigned int bScale = 255;
01192                 const unsigned int up_indx = indx;
01193                 const unsigned int down_indx = indx - 1;
01194                 const Real interpol = (height  - mParent->heights[down_indx]) 
01195                         * mParent->dividers[up_indx];  
01196 
01197                 std::vector<Real> alpha;   
01198                 alpha.reserve(numHeights);
01199                 alpha.resize(numHeights);
01200                 for (unsigned int ialpha = 0; ialpha < numHeights; ialpha++) 
01201                 {    
01202                         alpha[ialpha] = 0.0f;
01203                 }
01204 
01205                 if (slope < 0.05f)// speed-up as it's invisible
01206                 {
01207                         const Real B = (1.0f - interpol);
01208                         const Real C = interpol;
01209 
01210                         alpha[indx - 1] = B;
01211                         alpha[indx] = C; 
01212                 }
01213                 else 
01214                 {
01215                         const Real A = (1.0f - slope);
01216                         const Real B = A * (1.0f - interpol);
01217                         const Real C = A * interpol;
01218                         const Real D = slope;
01219 
01220                         alpha[indx - 1] = B;
01221                         alpha[indx] = C; 
01222 
01223                         alpha[ 2 ] = alpha[ 2 ] + slope;
01224                         alpha[ 2 ] = alpha[ 2 ] > 1.0f ? 1.0f : alpha[ 2 ];
01225                 }
01226                 // save changes in textures
01227 
01228                 unsigned int currChannel = 0;
01229                 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mNumTexture; k++) 
01230                 {    
01231                         if (mImages[k].getBPP () == 8)
01232                         {
01233                                 uchar * const BaseData = mImages[k].getData ();
01234                                 assert (BaseData && "PagingLandScapeTexture::computePointAlpha()");
01235                                 const unsigned int curr_image_pos = imagePos*(static_cast <unsigned int>(mNumChannelperTexture[k]));
01236                                 assert (mNumChannelperTexture[k] == (mImages[k].getBPP ()/8));
01237                                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mNumChannelperTexture[k]; j++) 
01238                                 {  
01239                                         BaseData[ curr_image_pos + j] = static_cast <uchar> (alpha[currChannel]*bScale);
01240 
01241                                         currChannel++;
01242                                 }
01243                         }
01244                 }
01245         }
01246         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01247         void PagingLandScapeTexture::computePointColor(
01248                 const unsigned int imagePos,
01249                 const Real height, 
01250                 const Real slope)
01251         {
01252                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
01253                 const unsigned int numHeights = mParent->getOptions()->NumMatHeightSplat;
01254                 
01255                 unsigned int indx = 1;
01256                 while (indx < (numHeights - 1) && height >= mParent->heights[indx])
01257                         indx++;                                
01258 
01259                 const unsigned int bScale = 255;
01260                 const unsigned int up_indx = indx;
01261                 const unsigned int down_indx = indx - 1;
01262                 const Real interpol = (height  - mParent->heights[down_indx]) 
01263                         * mParent->dividers[up_indx];  
01264 
01265                 //ColourValue color;
01266                 std::vector<ColourValue> color; 
01267                 for (unsigned int itex = 0; itex < mNumTexture; itex++) 
01268                 {
01269                         for (unsigned int ichan = 0; ichan < mNumChannelperTexture[itex]; ichan++) 
01270                         {    
01271                                 color.push_back (ColourValue::Black);
01272                         }
01273                 }
01274 
01275 
01276                 indx = up_indx;
01277                 unsigned int currTexture = 0;
01278                 while (indx != 0)
01279                 {
01280                         if (indx < mNumChannelperTexture[currTexture])
01281                                 break;
01282                         indx = indx - mNumChannelperTexture[currTexture];
01283                         currTexture++;
01284                 }
01285                 currTexture = currTexture < mNumTexture ? currTexture : mNumTexture - 1;
01286 
01287                 if (slope < 0.05f)// speed-up as it's invisible
01288                 {
01289                         const Real B = (1.0f - interpol);
01290                         const Real C = interpol;
01291                         color[currTexture] = mParent->colors[down_indx] * B + mParent->colors[up_indx] * C;
01292                 }
01293                 else 
01294                 {
01295                         const Real A = (1.0f - slope);
01296                         const Real B = A * (1.0f - interpol);
01297                         const Real C = A * interpol;
01298                         const Real D = slope;
01299 
01300                         color[currTexture] = mParent->colors[down_indx] * B + mParent->colors[up_indx] * C + mParent->colors[2] * D;
01301                 }
01302                 // save changes in textures
01303                 unsigned int currChannel = 0;
01304                 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mNumTexture; k++) 
01305                 {    
01306                         if (mImages[k].getBPP () > 8)
01307                         {
01308                                 uchar * const BaseData = mImages[k].getData ();
01309                                 assert (BaseData && "PagingLandScapeTexture::computePointColor()");
01310                                 const unsigned int curr_image_pos = imagePos*(static_cast <unsigned int>(mNumChannelperTexture[k]));
01311                                 assert (mNumChannelperTexture[k] == (mImages[k].getBPP ()/8));
01312                                  
01313                                 BaseData[ curr_image_pos + 0] = static_cast <uchar> (color[k].r * bScale);
01314                                 BaseData[ curr_image_pos + 1] = static_cast <uchar> (color[k].g * bScale);
01315                                 BaseData[ curr_image_pos + 2] = static_cast <uchar> (color[k].b * bScale);
01316                                 currChannel += 3;
01317                         }                       
01318                 }
01319         }
01320         //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
01321         void PagingLandScapeTexture::paintPoint (const unsigned int imagePos,
01322                 const Real   paintForce)
01323         {
01324                 assert (mNumTexture > 0);
01325                 assert(mParent->channelModifList);
01326                 const std::vector<Real>  *channelModifList = mParent->channelModifList;
01327                 const uchar bScale = 255;
01328                 const Real invPaintForce = 1.0f - paintForce;
01329                 unsigned int currChannel = 0;
01330                 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < mNumTexture; k++)
01331                 {
01332                         uchar * const BaseData = mImages[k].getData();
01333                         assert (BaseData && "PagingLandScapeTexture::paint()");
01334                         const unsigned int currImagePos = imagePos * mNumChannelperTexture[k];
01335                         assert (currImagePos < mImages[k].getSize ());
01336                         assert (mNumChannelperTexture[k]*8 == mImages[k].getBPP ());
01337 
01338                         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < mNumChannelperTexture[k]; j++) 
01339                         {    
01340                                 BaseData[ currImagePos + j ] = 
01341                                         static_cast <uchar> (
01342                                                                 ((*channelModifList)[currChannel]) * paintForce * bScale 
01343                                                                 + BaseData[ currImagePos + j ] * invPaintForce
01344                                                                                 );
01345                                 currChannel++;
01346                         }
01347                         doTextureNeedUpdate[k] = true;
01348                 }
01349         }
01350 } //namespace
Generated on Mon Dec 11 10:28:05 2006 for RainbruRPG by  1.5.1
